alert.note: Alert for Clay; Craighead; Crittenden; Cross; Greene; Lee; Mississippi; Phillips; Poinsett; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 19 at 4:56AM CDT until March 19 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas, North Mississippi, Southeast Missouri and West Tennessee. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from now until 11 AM CDT Sunday. For the second Freeze Warning, from 9 PM Sunday to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Craighead; Crittenden; Cross; Greene; Lee; Mississippi; Phillips; Poinsett; St. Francis
